name: MUSC Health University Medical Center
notes: Flagship hospital of the Medical University of South Carolina, a state government component unit; SC's only comprehensive academic health system

name: University of Mississippi Medical Center
notes: Mississippi's only academic medical center and Level I trauma center; state-owned teaching hospital affiliated with the University of Mississippi

name: University of Texas Medical Branch
notes: State government-owned academic health science center; oldest medical school in Texas; part of the University of Texas System; Level I trauma center
